intro: Minuartia multinervis, commonly known as the rock白菜 or rock cress, is a flowering plant in the family Brassicaceae. It is a low-growing, mat-forming perennial that typically thrives in rocky or gravelly soils. The plant features small, lance-shaped leaves with prominent veins, which give it its scientific name "multinervis." Its flowers are usually white or pale yellow, arranged in clusters and blooming in early spring. It is often found in alpine or arctic regions, where it adapts to harsh environmental conditions.
